comments: He is the best prof ever. he helps you in every possible way he can. if you mess up any experiment he will tell u how to correct it and not making you do whole thing again. he is most understanding and caring professor! just take him if you can.. m sure you wont regret!
Very nice, helps you a lot
Agree -- VERY nice guy,patient with students, helps if you do not understand. If you must miss a lab, let him know (likes that and will work with you!). No tests for his lab!!!
Professor Aleem is very helpful, he is willing to show you the work and is very patient. His english may not be that great but he can be clear when he knows what to say.
